pageProduct.name: Swisse Glug-Glug Slug Womens Detox Bundle
pageProduct.description:
General Information

OVERINDULGING?
Being the queen of quarantine may have been fun, but it’s time to rein in your long reign of overindulgence. Luckily, we’ve created a Wellness Bundle to help.

THE UNDISPUTED BOSS OF OVERINDULGENCE
Over the long hibernation period, the Glug-Glug Slug has managed to turn enjoying a few too many of the finer things in life into a fine art.
Over-consumption of rich food and drink has left the poor Glug-Glug Slug in a battle with bloating and indigestion.
This pack has been specially designed to help Glug-Glug Slugs lose the blah and reclaim their star.

Warnings

Contains milk thistle, traditionally used in Western herbal medicine as a liver tonic to nourish, strengthen and protect the liver, aid healthy liver regeneration and promote bile flow from the liver.
Contains globe artichoke and turmeric, traditionally used in Western herbal medicine to relieve symptoms of indigestion such as abdominal pain, discomfort and bloating.
Always read the label. Follow the directions for use. If symptoms persist, talk to your healthcare professional. Supplements may only be of assistance if dietary intake is inadequate.

Common Uses

Grab a great deal with the Swisse Glug-Glug Slug Wellness Bundle designed to rein in a long reign of overindulgence. Hurry, the savings await!

Ingredients

Swisse Ultiboost Liver Detox is a premium quality formula containing herbs traditionally used to help support liver function and provide relief from indigestion and bloating. Contains milk thistle, traditionally used in Western herbal medicine as a liver tonic to nourish, strengthen and protect the liver, aid healthy liver regeneration and promote bile flow from the liver. Contains globe artichoke and turmeric, traditionally used in Western herbal medicine to relieve symptoms of indigestion such as abdominal pain, discomfort and bloating.

Looking for a natural botanical alternative to hyaluronic acid? Glow on and give Swisse Hyaluro-Natural® Hydration Boost Serum a go. Our luxurious formula features Niacinamide, Sweet Almond Oil and Jojoba Oil that protects the skin's moisture barrier to deliver a soft, supple and dewy complexion.

Swisse Manuka Honey Detoxifying Clay Mask is a luxurious facial treatment formulated to draw out impurities and toxins, refine pores and improve skin texture to reveal a glowing, smooth complexion
